function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertain viral load on inanimate surfaces","Impact":"Ineffective disinfection leading to higher viral load on surfaces","Mitigation":"Regular and thorough environmental cleaning and disinfection procedures","Technologies":"Hospital-level disinfectants, bleach, ethanol","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, cleaning staff"},{"Description":"Unknown frequency of hand contamination with coronavirus","Impact":"Lack of appropriate hand decontamination leading to potential transmission","Mitigation":"Regular use of alcohol-based hand rubs, following WHO recommendations","Technologies":"Alcohol-based hand rubs with 80% ethanol or 75% 2-propanol","People":"Healthcare workers, visitors, general public","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, individuals"}]}
